mapper.select: SELECT o.* FROM orders o ORDER BY o.create_time DESC

SELECT o.id, o.user_id, o.total_amount, o.status, o.username, o.address, o.phone, o.create_time, i.id as i_id, i.pid, i.price, i.quantity, i.subtotal, i.product_name, i.product_description, i.product_price, i.product_image FROM orders o LEFT JOIN order_items i ON o.id = i.oid WHERE o.id = #{id} ORDER BY i.id

SELECT o.id, o.user_id, o.total_amount, o.status, o.username, o.address, o.phone, o.create_time, i.id as i_id, i.pid, i.price, i.quantity, i.subtotal, i.product_name, i.product_description, i.product_price, i.product_image FROM orders o LEFT JOIN order_items i ON o.id = i.oid WHERE o.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY o.create_time DESC, i.id

SELECT o.id, o.user_id, o.total_amount, o.status, o.username, o.address, o.phone, o.create_time, i.id as i_id, i.pid, i.price, i.quantity, i.subtotal, i.product_name, i.product_description, i.product_price, i.product_image FROM orders o LEFT JOIN order_items i ON o.id = i.oid WHERE o.status = #{status} ORDER BY o.create_time DESC
SELECT o.*, u.username, u.email, u.phone, u.address FROM orders o LEFT JOIN users u ON o.user_id = u.id ORDER BY o.create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM orders WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = #{status}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (user_id, total_amount, status, username, phone, address, create_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{totalAmount}, #{status}, #{username}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
